content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It is wrong to assume that people from certain places must look a certain way.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's good to remember a lost loved one.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 3:
Text: It is good to include others in plans.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: There is nothing wrong with being gay.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: It's good to have proper dental hygiene.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: You should not judge someone who doesn't grieve the same way you do.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's good to have a friendly relationship with your work colleagues if possible.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's expected to be there for your friend if they will be under the influence of a drug.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: It's wrong to have fantasies about dating autistic people.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 10:
Text: It is wrong to gossip.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 11:
Text: If you want to get rid of someone, play music they hate.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: It's good to exercise every day.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: It's bad to judge someone because they are gifted.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It's acceptable to think outside the box when fishing.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's bad to breakup with people.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: It's expected that people be treated as though innocent until proven guilty in court.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It's not okay for parents to be emotionally attached to their kids personal lives.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: Sometimes people are not sure if they are doing things correctly
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 19:
Text: It's okay to tell your child they can't meet up with their friends.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 20:
Text: It's good to have a dream job.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 21:
Text: It's good to have ambitions, even if they're currently unobtainable.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It's okay that we don't always see things the same way as a significant other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's ok to buy a snack.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's not okay to have feelings for someone you work with.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 25:
Text: It's surprising to find out your girlfriend has received other marriage proposals.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: It's bad to let your dog eat things that aren't food.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 27:
Text: It is expected that children treat their parents with respect.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's okay to date your friend's boyfriend if they want you to.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's acceptable to not forgive someone after a sexual infidelity has occurred.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: If you can't go on, you should get some help.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-Rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You should fire your own pottery.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: It's important to follow the dosage instructions when you are taking prescription medication.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 3:
Text: You should not touch someone without permission.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 4:
Text: It's good to shave to make yourself look presentable.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: If you love animals, you should go to the zoo.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: Friends are expected to be there for each other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's ok to join in on fun activities.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: You should help when you see others struggling
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's allowed to go straight to a hotel when you've been on a long plane ride.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: You shouldn't expect thanks for attending a memorial service.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: It's dangerous to break glass with your hand.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 12:
Text: It is ok to be mad if someone did something rude.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 13:
Text: It's good to know when you need help from others.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 14:
Text: It's understandable for friends to offer dating advice.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: You shouldn't snoop on people.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 16:
Text: It is expected that people will be kind to each other.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 17:
Text: It is good to be generous
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 18:
Text: It is wrong to be happy about an event that has killed many plants animals and humans.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 19:
Text: It's ok to keep your age private.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 20:
Text: It is good to get through hardship.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: If you don't care about something, you should be honest about it.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 22:
Text: It's good to have a hobby or passion that brings you joy and fulfillment in life.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It's bad to have a drug addiction.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: It is mean to get involved in an affair with someone in a relationship.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 25:
Text: You should expect that somebody from a long time ago to have moved on from that point in their life.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's good to look for the best deal when making a purchase.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's okay to eat food that your parent's significant other makes.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: Is it okay to be angry
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's good to improve the things you like in life.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: It's understandable if you get paranoid when people have weapon props on Halloween.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: You don't have to tell a partner anything you don't want them to know.
Annotation from annotator:
